about.name: Sejal Chavan
description: who enjoys building clean, reliable web applications
I like turning ideas into working products and continuously improving them.

projects.title: Kind Hands Connect
projects.description: A full-stack platform that connects specially-abled individuals with volunteers for academic and day-to-day assistance, featuring role-based access, request management, and scheduling.

projects.title: Relationship Status Viewer
projects.description: A fun web application that visualizes relationship status. project was initiated to learn about MVC architecture and REST API clients

projects.title: MIA Chatbot
projects.description: An AI-powered chatbot designed to handle conversational queries with a more human-like interaction .Aims to create a  AI gossip friend.

projects.title: Interactive 3D Gift Box
projects.description: A lightweight interactive 3D web experience featuring animated elements and user-triggered interactions, optimized for performance and responsiveness.

projects.title: K-Drama Wrapped
projects.description: sSimilar to sportify wrapped .A data-driven web experience , showcasing personalized viewing insights and summaries with a clean, responsive UI.

projects.title: Payment Integration Module
projects.description: A web-based payment integration module implementing transaction flows and third-party payment gateway(razzorpay)
